name: Commando Strike Operation
description:
Commando Strike Operation is a complete military mission game which challenges you act as a real army military mission that you never felt in all military games

FEATURES
• Best FPS Commando Action Game
• Realistic Battle Field Environment
• Wonderful Controls
• Easy Navigations in city war
• User Friendly Interface
• High Quality Weapons
• Full of Action and Thrill
• Fearful Terrorist Pack
• Challenging and Thrilling Missions
• Addictive US army commando warfare
• 3D
